thread.title: Harry Potter May Help Conjure Up Sale of Japan Theme Park
thread.title_full: Harry Potter May Help Conjure Up Sale of Japan Theme Park - WSJ

author: Atsuko Fukase
title: Harry Potter May Help Conjure Up Sale of Japan Theme Park
text:
TOKYO—In Harry Potter’s latest bit of magic, the young wizard may do the trick to help secure a lucrative sale of the Universal Studios Japan theme park.
Universal Studios Japan, located in Osaka, center of the country’s second largest metropolitan area, has long struggled to compete with Tokyo Disney Resort, the country’s most popular theme park. While trainloads of teenagers decked out in Mickey Mouse regalia troop to Tokyo Disney... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
